text: Spring break is a holiday of either one or two weeks at colleges and universities in the United States. In the northern hemisphere, it happens around Easter. Spring break is a time when there are few exams. The students usually go to places where it is warm. Today, spring break is a time which is known for its parties. Spring break has become known for people having a good time. Usually, they also drink too much alcohol, take other drugs, try to practice Free Love, look for casual sex and they want to also show a lot of nudity. They are also after doing things that look a little odd, or crazy. Category:Holidays
title: Spring break
